content: daedalus socks notes sizes 1 2 3 4 actual finished sock circumference 17 20 23 25 5 cm / 6 75 7 75 9 10 to fit foot circumference 19 5 22 5 25 5 28 cm / 7 5 8 75 10 11 gauge 10x10cm 4 x 4 = 28sts x 40 rnds 2 75mm / us 2 pattern st all yardage is approximated it will depend on your knitting gauge and length of feet you are knitting for please use only as a guide mid-calf colour a 100 130 150 170 m / 110 143 165 186 yds colour b 85 104 115 125 m / 93 114 126 137 yds shortie colour a 90 105 115 130 m / 100 115 126 143 yds colour b 45 56 65 78 m / 50 62 72 86 yds dk weight shown in coop knits socks yeah shades 225 sugilite 218 quartz mid calves 214 pigeon 222 prunus shorties your preffered sock needle 2 75mm / us 2 by preferred sock needle it means to use a circular needle or a set of dpns stitch marker x 4 tapestry needle row counter instructions written/chart format originally published march 2024 photography ©kelly menzies artwork by caroline bond www carolinebond com for any queries regarding this pattern please contact use the contact form at www rowrowandkades com you can also find kelly on instagram and youtube as rowrowandkades find more patterns on payhip or ravelry rowrow and kades page 2 daedalus socks - dk abbreviations bor beginning of round sl1 slip one stitch purlwise with yarn borm beginning of round marker held in back of work cm s centimetres sm slip marker decrease decrease ssk slip the next st knitwise and the in / inches following st purlwise slip back k knit onto the lhn and knit them k1 tbl knit 1 through the back loop together through the back loop k2tog knit two stitches together st s stitch es lhn left hand needle treble_crochet st triplet stitch work another st into m marker s a twin st using the same method m1r make one right -make one stitch as below by picking up the bar from back to tw st twin stitch -on rs knit to stitch front between stitches and indicated lift right leg of stitch knitting into the front below with rhn and place it onto m1l make one left -make one stitch lhn knit into new st then place it by picking up the bar from front to back onto lhn on ws purl to back between stitches and stitch indicated slip last stitch knitting into the back loop onto rhn lift leg from stitch meas measures below using your lhn purl into p purl new stitch slip both loops back p2tog purl two stitches together onto your lhn pm place marker repeat repeat a good tutorial for the shadow wrap heel is the rhn right hand needle earth tones girl rm remove marker https //youtu be/fdw7rsmxvxs
